rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0001
rows.name:
I wonder why they hated us Earthlings
so much.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0002
rows.name: I don't know[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0003
rows.name:
But the appearance of hostile aliens
is a threat to us right now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0004
rows.name:
We need to get this information back to NLA
as quickly as possible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0005
rows.name:
Yeah. Just when I thought it was a planet
where we could finally live in peace.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0006
rows.name:
Please wait!
Please don't go~~!![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0007
rows.name: P- Please let me out of here~~!! meh!![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0008
rows.name:
More aliens!?
Wh- What should we do!?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0009
rows.name: Be careful, Lin![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0010
rows.name: Let me hear your thoughts?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_JNK0010
rows.name: Curious

rows.label: xs03060100_SEL0011
rows.name: Decide to open the container.

rows.label: xs03060100_JNK0020
rows.name: Cautious

rows.label: xs03060100_SEL0021
rows.name: Don't touch the container.

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0011
rows.name:
Finally out, meh!
Thank you, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0012
rows.name: Right. Let's leave it alone after all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0013
rows.name: Right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0014
rows.name:
Mehmehmeh~!!
W- w- wait a minute, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0015
rows.name:
Mommy said
you have to help people in trouble, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_JNK0030
rows.name: Forgive

rows.label: xs03060100_SEL0031
rows.name: Open the container while forcing a smile.

rows.label: xs03060100_JNK0040
rows.name: Tease

rows.label: xs03060100_SEL0041
rows.name: Gaze while smirking.

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0016
rows.name:
You're late, meh!
Tatsu almost suffocated, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0017
rows.name:
Gonna die, meh~!
Suffocating, meh~![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0018
rows.name: Huh? Mehmehmeh! I got out, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0019
rows.name: Apparently the food on this planet moves.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0020
rows.name:
Yeah.
[ST:wide ]―Actually, it's talking.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0021
rows.name:
Just as I thought, a different flavor from Earth food.
Makes a cooking enthusiast eager to show their stuff![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0021_m
rows.name:
I know what we're having for dinner tonight!
You don't know it yet, Newbie,
but I'm a pretty mean cook.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0021_f
rows.name:
I know what we're having for dinner tonight!
You don't know it yet, Newbie,
but I'm a pretty mean cook.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0022
rows.name:
Not food, meh!
Don't get all eager to show off your skills, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0023
rows.name:
No, I was planning to eat them, but
Tatsu is definitely not food, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0024
rows.name:
Those Bias guys, since coming to Mira,
have bullied the Nopon a lot, meh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0025
rows.name:
Tatsu was bullied a lot too, meh.
At this rate, the Nopon race will perish, meh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0026
rows.name: Yes! Nopon are endangered species![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0027
rows.name:
Everyone has an obligation to protect
Tatsu, who is a Nopon, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0028
rows.name: For a food ingredient, you're pretty condescending.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0029
rows.name: Hold on.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0030
rows.name:
That species that captured you,
were they the Bias?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0031
rows.name: That's right, meh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0032
rows.name:
You said "since coming to Mira," right?
Does that mean they aren't native to Mira?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0033
rows.name: That's right, meh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0034
rows.name:
If you want more details,
you have to promise to protect Tatsu, meh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0035
rows.name: I'll sell you the info cheap, meh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0036
rows.name: Elma-san, should we just eat him?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0037
rows.name:
I was jokin, meh!
You don't need to pay, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0038
rows.name:
A-Actually, I'll tell you for free!
Just help me, please~~! Meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0039
rows.name: So if I understand correctly...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0040
rows.name:
In other words, you Nopon
are a species native to Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0041
rows.name:
And you're being threatened by the Bias
who appeared recently.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0042
rows.name: That's right, meh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0043
rows.name:
The Bias have lots of allies,
and they're always causing trouble, meh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0044
rows.name:
Allies[ST:wide ]―
You mean there are other aliens too?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0045
rows.name: That's right, meh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0046
rows.name:
They all ganged up
and did horrible things to Tatsu's Nopon friends, meh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0047
rows.name:
It's so frustrating, Tatsu wants to
eat them too, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_JNK0050
rows.name: Sympathize

rows.label: xs03060100_SEL0051
rows.name: Gently pat Tatsu's back.

rows.label: xs03060100_JNK0060
rows.name: Interested (in eating)

rows.label: xs03060100_SEL0061
rows.name: Imagine what Tatsu tastes like.

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0048
rows.name:
You'll console Tatsu, meh?
You're a good person, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0049
rows.name:
Tatsu likes you, meh!
I'll come with you to your village, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0050
rows.name:
You have the same eyes as the Bias, meh!
You plan to eat Tatsu, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0051
rows.name: Tatsu is delicious, but stop it, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0052
rows.name:
That's right!
Eating in a place without any cooking utensils is...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0053
rows.name:
Every food ingredient has
a cooking method that suits it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0054
rows.name:
That's right, meh!
You don't understand cooking at all, meh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0055
rows.name:
So Tatsu will come with you to your village
and teach you, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0056
rows.name: [ST:wide ]― Huh? W- Wait?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0057
rows.name: [ST:wide ]―That's what he says, so what should we do?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0058
rows.name:
One of him alone probably can't harm NLA,
and we could use the information.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0059
rows.name: Fine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0060
rows.name:
We have to report this incident
to Commander Vandham, and...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0061
rows.name:
If there are no problems with the quarantine kit,
let's take him to NLA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0062
rows.name: I'll scan him right away.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0063
rows.name: No problems![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0064
rows.name: Tatsu can come with you, meh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0065
rows.name:
Yay, meh!
You guys are good aliens, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0065_m
rows.name:
Yay, meh!
You guys are good aliens, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0065_f
rows.name:
Yay, meh!
You guys are good aliens, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0066
rows.name: ...I know![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0067
rows.name:
As thanks, a good thing,
Specially! For free![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0068
rows.name: I'll lend it to you all, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0069
rows.name: Huh? It's a gift, but you won't GIVE it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0070
rows.name:
Wh- wh- wha[ST:wide ]―
What a horrible thing to say, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0071
rows.name:
Giving it away?
Something that doesn't even make money...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0072
rows.name:
The pride of a Nopon Merchant
wouldn't allow it, meh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0073
rows.name: Nopon are a proud race, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0074
rows.name:
"Proud?"
You mean you're just greedy, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0075
rows.name: Not even listening[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0076
rows.name:
Do you all, by any chance
get lost all the time, meh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0076_m
rows.name:
Do you all, by any chance
get lost all the time, meh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0076_f
rows.name:
Do you all, by any chance
get lost all the time, meh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_JNK0070
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: xs03060100_SEL0071
rows.name: Shake head, indicating you don't even know where you are.

rows.label: xs03060100_JNK0080
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: xs03060100_SEL0081
rows.name: Close eyes and tell that getting lost is also part of life.

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0077
rows.name:
Just as I thought, meh!
You're all lucky, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0078
rows.name: Not so honest, meh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0079
rows.name:
Someone with that kind of twisted thinking should fall off a cliff
and get eaten by a Lophid, mo![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0080
rows.name: Navigation Ball![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0081
rows.name:
This ball of light is
a Nopon secret ultra-convenient item, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0082
rows.name:
When you get lost,
just follow this ball and it's a piece of cake, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0082_m
rows.name:
When you get lost,
just follow this ball and it's a piece of cake, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0082_f
rows.name:
When you get lost,
just follow this ball and it's a piece of cake, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0083
rows.name:
It can't be helped, I'll lend it
to everyone, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0084
rows.name: Be grateful, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0085
rows.name:
Navigation Ball...
Another completely blunt, straight-to-the-point name.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0086
rows.name: What are you saying, meh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0087
rows.name: You'd prefer Volare Venefica or something, huh...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0088
rows.name:
Some name aggravated by ◎※△◇ disease (chuunibyou)
whose meaning you don't even get.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0089
rows.name: It's much easier to understand and better, meh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0090
rows.name:
Seems suspicious...
Is this thing really gonna be useful?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0091
rows.name: I wouldn't like it if it just goes BOOM! as soon as I use it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0092
rows.name: 'BOOM!' reminds me, meh...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0093
rows.name:
If you break this precious Navigation Ball,
you'll have to compensate me, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0094
rows.name: Just as I suspected, you're a greedy one—[ST:wait ]
